summary: Just a simple re-texture of Draug Armor !
descriptionHtml:
You can craft this Obscure Armor if you have the ebony perk in smithing skill and you can also loot an enchanted version to Ninque Rinde which is an altar under college of Winterhold. I plan to make more re-textures for this mod.Â 

Feel free to comment if you notice any bugs.

Enjoy !

- D.
author: vanimacenta
